data_table.description: Sleep Heart Health Study Form. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: GENHTH25
variable.description: In general, would you say your health is (exc, v.good, good, fair, poor)?

variable.name: CMP1YR25
variable.description: Compared to one year ago, how would you rate your health (much better now-much worse now)?

variable.name: VIGACT25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports

variable.name: MODACT25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf

variable.name: LIFT25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: lifting or carrying groceries

variable.name: CLIMBS25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: climbing several flights of stairs

variable.name: CLIMB125
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: climbing one flight of stairs

variable.name: BEND25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: Bending, kneeling, or stooping

variable.name: WK1ML25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: walking more than a mile

variable.name: WKSBLK25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: walking several blocks

variable.name: WK1BLK25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: walking one block

variable.name: BATHE25
variable.description: Does your health now limit you in this activity, and if so, how much: bathing and dressing yourself

variable.name: PHCTDN25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of physical health: cut down on the amount of time you spend on work

variable.name: PHACLS25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of physical health: accomplished less than you would like

variable.name: LIMIT25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of physical health: Were limited in the kind of work or other activities you were able to do

variable.name: EXEFRT25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of physical health: had difficulty performing the work or other activities. (For example, it took extra effort.)

variable.name: EMCTDN25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of emotional problems: cut down on the amount of time you spend on work

variable.name: EMACLS25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of emotional problems: accomplished less than you would like

variable.name: CARFUL25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of emotional problems: Did not do work or other activities as carefully as usual

variable.name: PROBSA25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?

variable.name: BDPAIN25
variable.description: How much bodily pain have you had during the past 4 weeks?

variable.name: PAININ25
variable.description: During the past 2 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework)?

variable.name: PEP25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: Did you feel full of pep?

variable.name: NRVOUS25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: have you been a very nervous person?

variable.name: DOWN25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: have you felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up?

variable.name: CALM25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: have you felt calm and peaceful?

variable.name: ENERG25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: did you have a lot of energy?

variable.name: BLUE25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: have you felt downhearted and blue?

variable.name: WORN25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: did you feel worn out?

variable.name: HAPPY25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: have you been a happy person?

variable.name: TIRED25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: did you feel tired?

variable.name: HLTHLM25
variable.description: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time: has your health limited your social activities (like visiting with friends or close relatives)?

variable.name: SICKEZ25
variable.description: Choose (definitely True-definitely False): I seem to get sick a little easier than other people.

variable.name: HLTHY25
variable.description: Choose (definitely true-definitely False): I am as healthy as anybody I know.

variable.name: WORSE25
variable.description: Choose (definitely true-definitely false): I expect my health to get worse.

variable.name: EXCLNT25
variable.description: Choose (definitely True-definitely False): my health is excellent.
